hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
### assume etl role aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 900 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
mkdir data mkdir completed mkdir hierarchies mkdir processing
find data/ -type f -exec rm -rf {} \; find processing/ -type f -exec rm -rf {} \; find completed/ -type f -exec rm -rf {} \; rm -rf pic-sure-hpds/
aws s3 cp ${managed_inputs} data/
aws s3 cp ${metadata_file} data/metadata.json
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
csvcut -c 1,2,3,8,9 data/Managed_Inputs.csv > inputs.csv
# Generate mappings cat inputs.csv IFS=',' [ ! -f inputs.csv ] while read abv_name stdy_id stdy_type data_ready data_processed do if [[ "${data_ready,,}" == "yes" ]] && [[ ${data_processed,,} == "no" ]]; then
if [[ ${stdy_type,,} == "topmed" ]] || [[ ${stdy_type,,} == "parent" ]]; then
### assume etl role aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 3600 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
echo "aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/rawData/ data/ --recursive --exclude="*" --include="${stdy_id}*" --quiet" aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/rawData/ data/ --recursive --exclude="*" --include="${stdy_id}*" --quiet
java -jar jars/DbgapTreeBuilder3.jar -trialid ${stdy_id} > completed/${stdy_id}_mapping_gen.log cat completed/${stdy_id}_mapping_gen.log aws s3 cp completed/${stdy_id}_mapping2.csv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/mappings/${stdy_id}/mapping2.csv --quiet aws s3 cp completed/${stdy_id}_mapping_gen.log s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/mappings/${stdy_id}/${stdy_id}_mapping_gen.log --quiet aws s3 cp completed/${stdy_id}_FilesMissingDictionaries.csv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/mappings/${stdy_id}/${stdy_id}_FilesMissingDictionaries.csv --quiet
#find data/ -type f -exec rm -rf {} \;
### remove role for next iteration unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN fi fi done < inputs.csv
